name: Chickenality
description:
You play as a scientist who, after an unsuccessful experiment, moved into the body of a chicken, and his experimental mice mutated and turned into monsters who are trying to kill their tormentor, but the scientist is not as simple as it turned out, because there are a lot of different weapons in his arsenal.

Chickenality - A top-down game, you control a chicken in an arena where enemies appear, in each level you find yourself with a unique weapon, ammo, health packs and explosive barrels. Challenge yourself to last as long as possible.



Game Features:
- Visual style
- Many Weapons
- Difficulty
